g.text: You must set preferences before activating iiidea,

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: will cause the preferences to be set.

g.text: Notification that the iiidea has been turned on

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: When using external web services or using functions that require authorization such

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: as location information in the OS:

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: In case the authentication information required to use external web services is not sufficient:

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: The required list of information is passed to ERServiceProxyData[]

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: In case the necessary permissions are not obtained from the OS:

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans

g.text: The required permission list is passed to String[] of completion as

text.font-family: Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
Noto Sans JP, Helvetica, Arial, Liberation Sans
